issue.title: [R] Implement full S3FileSystem/S3Options constructor
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9869](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9869). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently you can access data in S3 by URI, which can include auth and other query parameters (ARROW-9854), but you can't directly construct an S3Options object.
